name: example-create-react-app-express
description: Example on using create-react-app with a Node Express Backend

scripts.client: cd client && bundle && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build --watch --incremental
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV='development' concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: cd client && bundle && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build && cd .. && npm install
